name: Rachel-xmd
description: A WhatsApp bot based on Baileysjs library (Ts+Js) with Multi Device support

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Enter your WhatsApp number in international format without '+' e.g., 254712345678

BOT_PREFIX.description: Put your bot prefix of desire here

ANTIDELETE.description: Type true if you want your bot to detect deleted messages in your DM, else false

AUTO_TYPE.description: Type true if you want your bot to show fake typing in your chats, else false

AUTO_RECORD.description: Type true if you want your bot to show fake recording in your chat, else false

AUTO_STATUS.description: Type true if you want bot to view status, else false

PACK_NAME.description: Type your sticker pack name here

AUTHOR.description: Type your author sticker name here
